fields.title: Grace Revealed in Romans 5:8
fields.body: Christ died for me while I was still a sinner. That's love!

fields.title: Hope in Isaiah 40:31
fields.body: Those who wait on the Lord shall renew their strength.

fields.title: Peace in Philippians 4:7
fields.body: The peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and minds.

fields.title: Strength in Joshua 1:9
fields.body: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid, for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go.

fields.title: Love in 1 Corinthians 13:4
fields.body: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.

fields.title: Faith in Hebrews 11:1
fields.body: Faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.

fields.title: Comfort in Psalm 23:4
fields.body: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me.

fields.title: Wisdom in Proverbs 3:5
fields.body: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
